short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swipe across all major tier 1 ad networks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SwipeBuilder let's you swipe ads from TikTok Creative Center, the TikTok Feed,  Meta's Ad Library, Google's Transparency Center and Wistia hosted VSLs so that you can share them and recreating for your own brand.  

Our chrome extension makes it possible for you to swipe across all major tier 1 ad networks. 

Key Features
• Save ads from Meta AdLibrary
• Save content form TikTok's Organic Feed
• Save ads from TikTok's Creative Center 
• Save from Google and Youtube 
• Save VSLs hosted on Wistia
• Download them whenever you want
• Organize inside of folders
• No Expired Links: Saved ads get stored in the cloud and you have access forever.
• Save landing pages 
• Filter By Network
• Share Links: Create a link to share a board with anyone
• Download ads from Facebook or TikTok

Bonuses:
• Discovery ads 
• The best AI direct response copywriter
